TEXT.TITLE: CHINA, HONG KONG FIRMS SIGNS LOAN AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: <China Sports Service Corp> of China and <Seylla Corp> of Hong Kong signed an agreement to borrow five billion yen from an international syndicate of banks led by the Bank of China, the New China News Agency said. It said the two firms will use the money to construct the Olympic Hotel, with 14 storeys and 380 rooms, near Peking's largest indoor stadium, to cater for participants at international competitions and tourists. Construction of the hotel is under way and due to be completed by June 1988, the agency added but gave no more details. REUTER
